TopicTitle: Can I drag the new 1.8 parts into an ongoing 1.73 career game?

Articles.Content:
I have multiple instances of KSP installed and I'm enjoying a modified (KSRSS) career game right now.  I also have installed the new Moar Boosters 1.8 version.  Is there nay way to import the new parts from 1.8 into my 1.73? 

Thanks.

I'm pretty sure, based on reports I've heard, that simply copying the part files over does not work.

Beyond that, I do not know.


Happy landings!
